alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:18AM MST until December 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Kit Carson County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. In addition visibility will be reduced in the band of snow during the night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain which falls on highways ahead of the snow may turn to ice as temperatures cool. Bridges will be the most susceptible for patches of ice forming.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
